item.description:
Hi Everyone,
Betsy has a movie suggestion..
All i have ever heard about Harry Potter is good for us geezers and kids also..

The info:
What Betsy wrote:
----------------------------------------------------------------
Al, Would you post this, please? Hopefully, no one else
planned an event this night.
DONE....

What: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix: An IMAX 3D
Experience

When: Tuesday, JULY 31, 2007 6:30pm

Where: Showcase Cinemas Buckland Hills
99 Redstone Road, Manchester, CT, 06040

MAP:
http://maps.yahoo.com...[Movie%20Theaters]&bfkey=mov&q1=99%20Redstone%20Road,%20Manchester,%20CT%2006040&trf=0&lon=-72.515945&lat=41.800239&mag=7

Additional Info: I will be grabbing a bite to eat before the
movie, if anyone wants to join me for food, call my cell (860)
922-0611

Texas Roadhouse http://www.texasroadh...
21 Redstone Road
Manchester, CT 06042-8754
Phone: 860-645-7427

Ok see the info on the RSVP how to find Betsy at the thearter or restaurant...

al-r's note:
The IMAX 3 d stuff sure sounds good though..someday i will check this place out...
I wish you all a good movie night...
al-r

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Betsy's Movie Suggestion, IMAX Harry Potter
